<title level="1" right="Trait">[Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

The divination school of magic typically involves obtaining or transferring information, or predicting events.
